title: A $100 Million Bet on Finding the Next ‘Mr. Beast’
description: Reed Duchscher, the manager of the YouTube megastar “Mr. Beast,” is teaming up with the investment firm TCG to bankroll businesses led by online creators.
dc:creator: Benjamin Mullin
media:description: A new firm, Night Capital, will look for entrepreneurs like Jimmy Donaldson, a.k.a. Mr. Beast, who can sell products and market themselves.
